# The `Module` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

In SandboxIR the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/module">Module</a> is mainly used to access the list of global objects. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

In SandboxIR the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/module">Module</a> is mainly used to access the list of global objects.

Definition at line 31 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/module-h">Module.h</a>.

### getGlobalVariable() {#a934952262fbf2d6a8f7fe98028f1eb72}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>GlobalVariable &#42; llvm::sandboxir::Module::getGlobalVariable (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, bool AllowInternal) const</>}>
Look up the specified global variable in the module symbol table.

If it does not exist, return null. If AllowInternal is set to true, this function will return types that have InternalLinkage. By default, these types are not returned.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/module-h/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/module-h">Module.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getNamedAlias() {#a14ab4774894bb159a24cb7af9c4b8a7a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>GlobalAlias &#42; llvm::sandboxir::Module::getNamedAlias (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name) const</>}>
Return the global alias in the module with the specified name, of arbitrary type.

This method returns null if a global with the specified name is not found.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/module-h/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/module-h">Module.h</a>.

Return the global variable in the module with the specified name, of arbitrary type.
